site_name: CHARLES Mc GINNIS & DEBBI Mc GINNIS

citations.narrative:
Two enclosures in the whelping building had excessive amounts of fecal material on the floors of the inside and outside of
the enclosures to the point that the dogs could not avoid stepping in the feces. One enclosure contained 4 weaned Corgi
puppies and the other enclosure contained a female Dachshund and her 5 puppies. The towels used for bedding in the
Corgi enclosure were dirty and soiled. There was also dirt and grime on the inside walls of the enclosures and on the
outside of the doors used by the dogs. Feces, dirt, and grime can harbor organisms that can affect the health of the dogs.
The licensee must ensure that cleaning and sanitization are done as frequently as necessary to prevent excessive
accumulation of feces, to prevent soiling of the dogs, and to reduce disease hazards.
To be corrected by October 5, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(3) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
Two enclosures in the whelping building had excessive amounts of fecal material on the floors of the inside and outside of 
the enclosures to the point that the dogs could not avoid stepping in the feces. One enclosure contained 4 weaned Corgi 
puppies and the other enclosure contained a female Dachshund and her 5 puppies. The towels used for bedding in the 
Corgi enclosure were dirty and soiled. There was also dirt and grime on the inside walls of the enclosures and on the 
outside of the doors used by the dogs. Feces, dirt, and grime can harbor organisms that can affect the health of the dogs. 
The licensee must ensure that cleaning and sanitization are done as frequently as necessary to prevent excessive 
accumulation of feces, to prevent soiling of the dogs, and to reduce disease hazards. 
To be corrected by October 5, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
